ModMetaData.name: aws Statuari Block
ModMetaData.author: Awakened
ModMetaData.description: A simple mod that add a new beautiful practical stone block called statuari(rgb 255,254,249) in game, you can use any chunk to make it. Besides, You can use statuari block to make drug lab, tailor bench, hi-tech research bench etc in vanilla. 一个简单的mod，添加了一个新的漂亮实用的叫做“雪霜白”的石材(rgb 255,254,249)，你可以用任意石块制作它，另外，你可以用这种石砖制作原版的药物试验台、高级研究台、裁缝台等。
